name: Hacker Challenge
description:
Hacker Challenge is a fun and challenging puzzle game that puts your problem-solving skills to the test. In this game, your goal is to connect the electrical circuit to the charger by rotating the wires to the correct position. However, the wires are not in the right direction at first, so you must rotate them to complete the circuit.

As you progress through the levels, the puzzles become more complex and challenging. Sometimes, the circuit is temporary, which means that you have a limited amount of time to complete the connection before the circuit breaks and you have to start over, to rotate the wires, you simply tap and drag them to the desired location.

The game is designed to be intuitive and easy to pick up, but it will test your problem-solving skills and your ability to think creatively. With each level, the challenge increases, but the satisfaction of successfully completing a puzzle is well worth the effort.

Overall, Hacker Challenge is a simple yet addictive puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours. With its increasing difficulty and intuitive gameplay, it's a great way to challenge your mind and have fun at the same time.
